original: Sven Fredrik, distriktsveterinär, Uddevalla, f. 17/8/94 i Skara av Sven Aug. W. o. Fredrika Sahlén. G. 28 m. Anna-Lisa Bjurström. Barn: Sven-Einar ’f. 29, Kerstin 31, Göran 35, In|grid 42. — Stud:ex. i Skara 15, ve-ter:ex. 23. Bat :veter. i Fältveter :kår. res. 25. Distr :veter. i Loos 27, Röksberg 28, Uddevalla :fr. 29, export- o. importbes :veter. , Gustaf Pontus, fd. rektor, Göteborg, f. 18/6/77 i Valla, Gbgs o. Bob. 1. G. 16 m. Saga Btablad. Barn: Hans f. 17, civ :ekon., kamrer, Gbg, Bo 19, fil. mag.. Forsa. — Mog:ex. i Jönkö>p. 97, teoil. fil. ex. i Upps.. 98^ dim:ex. 02, teol. lic. 10, provår v. Norra real i Sthlm 10-11. Lår. v. A. Sandströms h. lär:nesem. 09-12, v. Pe-dag. sk. i Upps. ll-lS’, extralär. v. Upps. h. at. 1. saimma tid, adj. i Gävle 1B\ vik. lektor v. h. lår:nesem. 14, adj. v. Gbgs foilksk :sem. 14, lektor där 18, lär. v. Gbgs kvinnl. ’folksk :sem. 15-24, rektor v. folksk :sem. i Linköp. 24-29, i Gbg 30-43. Tf. undervisn:råd 28-30, led. av styr. f. stat. uppfostr :anst. å Bona sed. 27, insp. v. Gbgs ensk. gymn. f. bliv. präster 30-44, ordf. i styr. f. Sigrid Rudebecks sk. o. studiehemmet Nordgården sed. 311, styr :ordf. i S v. sem:lår :’fören. 32-41, i sällsk. f. bild. av småbarnssk. sed. 38, andre ordf. i Sv:es kyrkl. lär:!förb. sed. 41, v. ordf. i Alllm. sv. fören. f. vårdien av sinnes slöa 43-46, ordf. sed. 46, insp. v. folksk :siem. i Gbg sed. 43, stud :rek-tor v. Gbgs förskolesem. sed. 44, fd. granskn :man f. bestämm. av lärob. i kristend., sekr. i Kyrkohist. fören., Smål. nat. i Upps. förste kur. m. m. Skr.: Striden om konfessio-nslös eller konfessionell relig :undervisn. (19), Om illärarutbilidn. v. våra folksk :sem. (32), Lärarkallets inverkan på låraren (331), Skolau o. den relig.-sedliga fostran (3(5) m. m., medarb. i Sv. biogr. lex., Skola o. samhälle. KN02kl, RDDO.
translated: Sven Fredrik, district veterinarian, Uddevalla, b. 17/8/94 in Skara to Sven Aug. W. and Fredrika Sahlén. M. 28 to Anna-Lisa Bjurström. Children: Sven-Einar b. 29, Kerstin b. 31, Göran b. 35, Ingrid b. 42. - Studied for matriculation exam in Skara in 1915, veterinary exam in 1923. Served as a veterinarian in the Field Veterinary Corps. Res. 1925. District veterinarian in Loos in 1927, Röksberg in 1928, Uddevalla from 1929, handling import and export inspections. Gustaf Pontus, former principal, Gothenburg, b. 18/6/77 in Valla, Gothenburg and Bohus County. M. 16 to Saga Btablad. Children: Hans b. 17, economist, accountant in Gothenburg, Bo b. 19, Master of Philosophy, in Forsa. - Graduated from high school in Jönköping in 1897, Bachelor of Theology from Uppsala University in 1898, Master's degree in theology from Uppsala University in 1902, licensed theologian in 1910, taught at Norra Real in Stockholm in 1910-1911. Taught at A. Sandström's home teacher training seminar in 1909-1912, at the Pedagogical School in Uppsala in 1911-1915, substitute teacher at Uppsala high school at the same time, assistant pastor in Gävle in 1916, temporary lecturer at the home teacher training seminar in Gothenburg in 1914, assistant at Gothenburg People's School Seminar in 1914, lecturer there in 1918, teacher at Gothenburg Women's People's School Seminar from 1915-1924, principal at the People's School Seminar in Linköping from 1924-1929, in Gothenburg from 1930-1943. Acting education counselor from 1928-1930, member of the board of the state educational institution Bona since 1927, inspector at the Gothenburg Private Gymnasium for future priests from 1930-1944, chairman of the board of Sigrid Rudebeck's school and study home Nordgården since 1931, chairman of the board of the Swedish Seminarist Association from 1932-1941, in the society for the promotion of early childhood education since 1938, vice chairman of the Swedish Church School Teachers' Association since 1941, deputy chairman of the Swedish Association for the Care of Mentally Disabled since 1943-1946, chairman since 1946, inspector at the People's School Seminar in Gothenburg since 1943, study director at Gothenburg Preschool Seminar since 1944, former examiner for determining the content of religious education textbooks, secretary of the Church History Association, Småland Nation in Uppsala, first course, etc. Writings: The Struggle between Confessional or Non-confessional Religious Education (1919), Teacher Education at our People's School Seminars (1932), The Influence of the Teaching Vocation on the Teacher (1931), School and Moral-Spiritual Education (1936), etc., collaborator in the Swedish Biographical Encyclopedia, School and Society. Knight of the Order of the Polar Star, honorary member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Letters, History and Antiquities.
